page.title: 06STOCK FARMING
page.content: {STOCK FARMING DUNSMORE The farms in the area have a variety of livestock. Milk production is much the fore. There are two large pedigree Friesian herds at Little London Farm and Wendover Dene Farm, while the Jersey herd at Grove Farm is internationaly known and acclaimed. This farm also has a herd of Limosan cattle. Beef cattle are also a feature of the district, and the parkland at Chequers Court has a herd of suckling beef. Sheep, while not so plentiful, are reared on several farms. A tenant of the beautiful Tudor Small Dene Farm has a herd of the rare breed Soary Sheep. Horses are of course a great part of the Chiltern landscape and besides the riding establishments many farms have grazing land for these animals.
